attributes.action: Reduce abortion from 24 weeks to 12 weeks
attributes.additional_details:
At 12 weeks/3 months, the foetus by now, has a brain, a heartbeat, a developing nerevous system and can be recognised as either a boy or girl. From 10 weeks, pain receptors are present and breathing movements can be recorded, meaing that if you abort a foetus after the first trimester, it will feel the pain of being terminated and that will be one son/daughter that could have had an appropriate name for its gender, being terimated.
At 24 weeks, the baby still has a chance of survival if premature and most if not all of its vital organs and human features are present.
Pease sign this petition if you are pro-choice but against unborn babies feeling unnecessary pain as they're practically being killed with a gender, a heartbeat, organs and senses intact.
